message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. It's a great deal for both of us, as it's worth a lot more to you. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate it, but I can only pay up to $10,000 for the product. Let me know if this works for you.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not able to go that low.  I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This is still a great deal for you, as you value the product at $12,000. Let's try to make this work.
Hello Alice, I understand your position. I'm willing to pay $10,200 for the product. Let me know if this is within your range.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I'm willing to come down to $10,300. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. Let's close this deal.
